text: Dick Norman was the defending champion, but chose to compete in Monte Carlo instead. Santiago González won in the final 3–6, 6–1, 7–5 against Michał Przysiężny. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Singles Abierto Internacional del Bicentenario Leon - Singles 2010 Singles
